subject_terms_3: Indian National Army (Singapore) Indian National Army Monument Site periodicals
physical_appearance: This clipping is a page from the periodical 'The Orient Illustrated Weekly', titled 'Jawaharlal in Ipoh'. The title is printed at the top of the page. The clipping includes six black-and-white photographs, taken in the town of Ipoh Malaya, during Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru's visit in March 1946. The edges of the page are slightly torn, especially on the right.
title_text: The Orient Weekly Jawaharlal in Ipoh
subject_terms_1: nationalism Indian (South Asian) political events rallies periodicals
